text: I am using the sad_panda gem, but it was last updated in 2013. There was a pull request to increase the speed of 'stemming' the words, which are then analyzed, but that pull request was in Feb 26. I may have to end up using that pull request then so I don't end up waiting forever.
Yeah you might. The author seems active, but focused on other things.
looks like the pull request is a very simple diff. I'd fork it and try
